# `/transfer` Command
Transfers a player to another server.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Owner</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>Yes</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### `/transfer <pfidOrMSA: string> <server: string> [port: int]`

## Arguments
- `pfidOrMSA`: string
- `port`: int
- `server`: string
